level.heading: Applicability of subchapter.
level.text: The provisions of this subchapter shall apply in the District of Columbia in lieu of the provisions of sections 3146 through 3152 of Title 18, United States Code.

level.heading: CREDIT(S)
level.text: (July 29, 1970, 84 Stat. 650, Pub. L. 91-358, title II, ยง 210(a).)
